p: It has been reported that new infections were associated with inconsistent condom use and concentrated in the large cities, however, factors driving this epidemics in Poland remain largely understudied [ 6]. Across HIV infected populations subtype B remained stably the most common HIV-1 variant (95.8â€“86.1%) [ 11, 12] and associated with male gender, MSM transmissions, higher CD4 lymphocyte counts and lower HIV plasma viremia at care entry [ 13, 14].
